ORIGAM Documentation : Master-Detail Screens Feature

Created by Tomáš Vavrda on Dec 30, 2014

It is incredibly easy to design master-detail (or even multi-level master-detail) screens in ORIGAM. The data views automatically take over the information about the hierarchy from the data model and allow you to design multi-level master-detail screens.

Example

2-level master-detail screen with details organized into tabs:
